//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "player", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{

	task ( "execute" )
	{
		sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_VOICE, "sound/npc/team/orders/execute.mp3" );
	}

	dowait ( "execute" );
	wait ( 2000.000 );
	sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_VOICE, "sound/weapons/sniper/fire_01.wav" );
	wait ( 500.000 );
	set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_HEALTH", -1 );
}
